txt.en: Gellamiel can be found in Ost Galadh.\n\nYou should speak with Gellamiel.
Roving Threat: Thorang, the Spirit Armour
Elite lieutenants of Dol Guldur have been seen patrolling the hostile region of Southern Mirkwood, including Thorang, a spirit trapped within deadly armour.
Thorang can be found somewhere in Southern Mirkwood.\n\nYou should defeat Thorang.
'The forces of Dol Guldur may outnumber us but our hope outshines all. You have done a great service for the Malledhrim.'

'I have seen strange lights in the forest, like a storm in the night. There is a servant of Dol Guldur that wields lightning. This is no creature of the living but some sort of sorcery controlled armour. Thorang has no will of its own. It is a shell of evil-imbued metals controlled by ancient, dark magic. You must break the bond the animates this monstrosity.'
